title: Marinated red snapper with turmeric and coconut rice salad and citrus relish
ingredients: 1 fillet red snapper, skinned and sliced into very thin strips
100g/3½oz rice, cooked according to packet instructions and cooled
salt and freshly ground black pepper
small piece fresh coconut, chopped flesh only
small handful fresh flatleaf parsley, chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
